name: 中文 (Zhōngwén), 汉语, 漢語

contents.name: Open Bible Stories
contents.subject: Bible stories
contents.description: 50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, for evangelism & discipleship, in text, audio, and video, on any mobile phone, in any language, for free. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.

contents.name: translationWords
contents.subject: Translation Words
contents.description: A basic Bible lexicon that provides translators with clear, concise definitions and translation suggestions for every important word in the Bible. It provides translators and checkers with essential lexical information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: OBS translationQuestions
contents.subject: Translator Questions
contents.description: Comprehension and theological questions for Open Bible Stories. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

contents.name: OBS translationNotes
contents.subject: Translator Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical notes that provide historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Open Bible Stories
contents.subject: Bible stories
contents.description: 50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, for evangelism & discipleship, in text, audio, and video, on any mobile phone, in any language, for free. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.

contents.name: Unlocked Literal Bible
contents.subject: Bible
contents.description: An open-licensed update of the ASV, intended to provide a 'form-centric' understanding of the Bible. It increases the translator's understanding of the lexical and grammatical composition of the underlying text by adhering closely to the word order and structure of the originals.

contents.name: Unlocked Dynamic Bible
contents.subject: Bible
contents.description: An open-licensed translation, intended to provide a 'functional' understanding of the Bible. It increases the translator's understanding of the text by translating theological terms as descriptive phrases.

contents.name: translationNotes
contents.subject: Translator Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical notes that provide historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: translationQuestions
contents.subject: Bible translation comprehension questions
contents.description: Comprehension and theological questions for each chapter of the Bible. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

contents.name: translationAcademy
contents.description: A modular handbook that provides a condensed explanation of Bible translation and checking principles that the global Church has implicitly affirmed define trustworthy translations. It enables translators to learn how to create trustworthy translations of the Bible in their own language.

subcontents.name: ରୋମୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ପତ୍ର
କରିନ୍ଥୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ଦ୍ୱିତୀୟ ପତ୍ର
ଏଫିସୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ପତ୍ର
ଫିଲିପ୍ପୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ପତ୍ର
କଲସୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ପତ୍ର
ଥେସଲନୀକୀୟ ମଣ୍ଡଳୀ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ଦ୍ୱିତୀୟ ପତ୍ର
ତୀମଥିଙ୍କ ନିକଟକୁ ପ୍ରେରିତ ପାଉଲଙ୍କ ପ୍ରଥମ ପତ୍ର
